00013 //
00014 // AnchorTextAnnotator
00015 //
00016 // 25 May 2004 -- tds
00017 //
00018 // Reads anchor text in from files created by the 
00019 // combiner, and adds the text to the end of the
00020 // parsed document
00021 //
00022 
00023 #ifndef INDRI_ANCHORTEXTANNOTATOR_HPP
00024 #define INDRI_ANCHORTEXTANNOTATOR_HPP
00025 #include "zlib.h"
00026 #include "indri/Buffer.hpp"
00027 #include "indri/Transformation.hpp"
00028 #include <iostream>
00029 #include "indri/TagExtent.hpp"
00030 #include "indri/ParsedDocument.hpp"
00031 #include "indri/TokenizedDocument.hpp"
00032 #include "indri/TokenizerFactory.hpp"
00033 #include <fstream>
00034 #include <algorithm>
00035 
00036 #define LINE_SIZE 65536 * 10
00037 #define DOCNO_SIZE 256
00038 #define LINKLINE_SIZE 1024*1024*8
00039 #define GZ_BUFFER_SIZE 10*1024*1024
00040 #define BUFFER_SIZE 100*1024*1024
00041 
00043 namespace indri
00044 {
00046   namespace parse
00047   {
00051     class AnchorTextAnnotator : public Transformation {
00052       gzFile _in;
00053       indri::utility::Buffer _gzbuffer;
00054       indri::parse::Tokenizer* tokenizer;
00055       indri::parse::TokenizedDocument* tokenized;
00056       
00057       char _docno[DOCNO_SIZE];
00058       char *linkLine;
00059       
00060       int _count;
00061       indri::utility::Buffer _buffer;
00062       ObjectHandler<indri::api::ParsedDocument>* _handler;
00063 
00064       bool _readLine( char* beginLine, size_t max ) {
00065         size_t actual = 0;
00066 
00067         // make a buffer of a reasonable size so we're not always allocating
00068         if( _gzbuffer.size() < GZ_BUFFER_SIZE )
00069           _gzbuffer.grow( GZ_BUFFER_SIZE );
00070         if( (_gzbuffer.size() -  _gzbuffer.position()) < 1024*1024 ) {
00071           _gzbuffer.grow( _gzbuffer.size() + GZ_BUFFER_SIZE );
00072         }
00073 
00074         size_t readAmount = _gzbuffer.size() - _gzbuffer.position() - 2;
00075 
00076         // fetch next document line
00077         char* buffer = _gzbuffer.write( readAmount );
00078         char* result = gzgets( _in, buffer, (int)readAmount );
00079         
00080         if(!result) {
00081           return false;
00082         }
00083         // strip the newline
00084         actual = strlen(buffer);
00085         buffer[actual - 1] = 0;
00086         // truncate
00087         actual = std::min(actual, max);
00088         buffer[actual] = 0;
00089 
00090         _gzbuffer.unwrite( readAmount - actual );
00091         
00092         // all finished reading
00093         *_gzbuffer.write(1) = 0;
00094         strncpy(beginLine, (_gzbuffer.front() + _gzbuffer.position() - actual - 1), actual);
00095         return true;
00096         
00097       }
00098       
00099       void _readDocumentHeader() {
00100         char line[LINE_SIZE];
00101         bool result;
00102         _count = 0;
00103 
00104         // DOCNO=
00105         result = _readLine( _docno, DOCNO_SIZE );
00106         if( !result ) {
00107           return;
00108         }
00109         // DOCURL=
00110         result = _readLine( line, LINE_SIZE );
00111         if( !result ) {
00112           return;
00113         }
00114         // LINKS=
00115         result = _readLine( line, LINE_SIZE );
00116         if( !result ) {
00117           return;
00118         }
00119         _count = atoi( line+6 );
00120       }
00121 
00122       void _fetchText( indri::utility::greedy_vector<TagExtent *>& tags, 
00123                        indri::utility::greedy_vector<char*>& terms ) {
00124         // now, fetch the additional terms
00125         char line[LINE_SIZE];
00126         bool result;
00127         for( int i=0; i<_count; i++ ) {
00128           // LINK
00129           result = _readLine( line, LINE_SIZE );
00130           if( !result ) {
00131             return;
00132           }
00133 
00134           // LINKDOCNO 
00135           result = _readLine( line, LINE_SIZE );
00136           if( !result ) {
00137             return;
00138           }
00139           
00140           // TEXT=
00141           result = _readLine( linkLine, LINKLINE_SIZE );
00142           if( !result ) {
00143             return;
00144           }
00145 
00146           if (!linkLine[0]) continue;
00147           // stop adding extents, keep reading the lines to flush
00148           if (terms.size() > 125000) continue;
00149           char *textStart = linkLine+6;
00150           size_t textLen = strlen(textStart);
00151           // now insert the terms with a separate inlink for each
00152           // line.
00153           indri::parse::UnparsedDocument document;
00154           document.text = textStart;
00155           document.textLength = textLen + 1; // for the null
00156           document.content = document.text;
00157           document.contentLength = document.textLength - 1 ;
00158 
00159           tokenized = tokenizer->tokenize( &document );
00160           if (tokenized->terms.size() == 0) continue;
00161           int beginIndex = (int)terms.size();
00162           indri::utility::greedy_vector<char*>::iterator j  = 
00163             tokenized->terms.begin();
00164           // copy the terms into a persistent buffer
00165           while (j != tokenized->terms.end()) {
00166             size_t len = strlen (*j);            
00167             char *term = _buffer.write(len + 1);
00168             strncpy(term, *j, len);
00169             term[len] = '\0';
00170             terms.push_back( term );
00171             j++;
00172           }
00173           TagExtent * extent = new TagExtent;
00174           extent->name = "inlink";
00175           extent->begin = beginIndex;
00176           extent->end = (int)terms.size();
00177           extent->number = 0;
00178           extent->parent = 0;
00179           tags.push_back(extent);
00180         }
00181       }
00182       
00183       bool _matchingDocno( indri::api::ParsedDocument* document ) {
00184         // find DOCNO attribute in document
00185         for( size_t i=0; i<document->metadata.size(); i++ ) {
00186           const char* attributeName = document->metadata[i].key;
00187           const char* attributeValue = (const char*) document->metadata[i].value;
00188 
00189           if( !strcmp( attributeName, "docno" ) ) {
00190             if( !strcmp( attributeValue, _docno+6 ) ) {
00191               return true;
00192             } else {
00193               return false;
00194             }
00195           }
00196         }
00197  
00198         return false;
00199       }
00200 
00201   public:
00202     AnchorTextAnnotator() {
00203       tokenizer = indri::parse::TokenizerFactory::get("Word");
00204       _handler = 0;
00205       _in = 0;
00206       linkLine = new char[LINKLINE_SIZE];
00207     }
00208 
00209     ~AnchorTextAnnotator() {
00210       if( _in )
00211         gzclose( _in );
00212       _in = 0;
00213       delete tokenizer;
00214       delete[](linkLine);
00215     }
00216 
00217     void open( const std::string& anchorFile ) {
00218       if( _in )
00219         gzclose( _in );
00220       _in = gzopen( anchorFile.c_str(), "rb" );
00221       if( !_in )
00222         LEMUR_THROW( LEMUR_IO_ERROR, "Couldn't open file " + anchorFile + "." );
00223       _buffer.clear();
00224       _gzbuffer.clear();
00225       _readDocumentHeader();
00226     }
00227 
00228     indri::api::ParsedDocument* transform( indri::api::ParsedDocument* document ) {
00229       _buffer.clear();
00230       _buffer.grow( BUFFER_SIZE );
00231         
00232       _gzbuffer.clear();
00233       _gzbuffer.grow( GZ_BUFFER_SIZE );
00234       // surround current text with a mainbody tag
00235       TagExtent * mainbody = new TagExtent;
00236       mainbody->begin = 0;
00237       mainbody->end = (int)document->terms.size();
00238       mainbody->name = "mainbody";
00239       mainbody->number = 0;
00240       mainbody->parent = 0;
00241       // order no longer matters - the indexer takes care of any sorting needed
00242       document->tags.push_back( mainbody );
00243 
00244       // set old tags' parent to mainbody
00245       indri::utility::greedy_vector<TagExtent *>::iterator oldTag = document->tags.begin();
00246       indri::utility::greedy_vector<TagExtent *>::iterator oldTagsEnd = document->tags.end();
00247       while ( oldTag != oldTagsEnd ) {
00248         if ((*oldTag)->parent == 0) {
00249           (*oldTag)->parent = mainbody;
00250         }
00251         oldTag++;
00252       }
00253 
00254       if( _matchingDocno( document ) ) {
00255         _fetchText( document->tags, document->terms );
00256         _readDocumentHeader();
00257       }
00258       std::sort( document->tags.begin(), document->tags.end(), indri::parse::LessTagExtent() );
00259       return document;
00260     }
00261 
00262     void setHandler( ObjectHandler<indri::api::ParsedDocument>& handler ) {
00263       _handler = &handler;
00264     }
00265 
00266     void handle( indri::api::ParsedDocument* document ) {
00267       _handler->handle( transform( document ) );
00268     }
00269   };
00270 }
00271 }
00272 
00273 #endif // INDRI_ANCHORTEXTANNOTATOR_HPP
